name: antelope-token-api
description: Token balances, supply and transfers from the Antelope blockchains

scripts.start: export APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && bun index.ts
scripts.dev: export APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && bun --watch index.ts
scripts.lint: export APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && bunx tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck --pretty
scripts.test: export APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && bun test --coverage
scripts.build: export APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && bun build --compile ./index.ts --outfile antelope-token-api
